channel.title: How to host a 508?
channel.description:
Hi, I've hosted a 317 before- and completely understood how to code on it.I've also hosted a 525 once.. But now I want to move up to 508 :)
I noticed that when I downloaded a 508 source there's no 'run.bat' though..
Is there some other way I'm supposed to run it? :confused: Or how do I make the run.bat for it?

item.title: How to host a 508?
item.dc:creator: @killer117 killer117
item.description:

Hi, I’ve hosted a 317 before- and completely understood how to code on it.I’ve also hosted a 525 once… But
now I want to move up to 508
